text:
@SecPompeo #WeChat‘s heavy censorship is not just hurting the Chinese people.  #COVID19 proves that it hurts the whole world if allowed to continue. Please sign and retweet this white house petition to hold  puppet Tencent accountable. 

https://t.co/F1AaDbHezb https://t.co/6352LTuuBo
